H0.text: Which group did Steve Marriot go on to form when he left the 'Small Faces'. Humble Pie

H1.text: Which group did Steve Marriot go on to form when he left the 'Small Faces'. The Faces

H2.text: Which group did Steve Marriot go on to form when he left the 'Small Faces'. Blind Faith

H3.text: Which group did Steve Marriot go on to form when he left the 'Small Faces'. Umbles

A4.text: This grouping was originally set to be called The Official Receivers, The Three Trojans (after McJohn departed) or The Pie, but ended up billed by promoters as Humble Pie.
